articles.description: Power Grid on Wednesday reported 10% growth in its consolidated net profit at Rs 4,028 crore in the third quarter, compared with Rs 3,645 crore posted in the corresponding quarter of the previous year.
articles.content: Shares of Power Grid Corporation jumped nearly 7% to the day's high of Rs 286 on Thursday after the company reported growth in its December quarter profit and second interim dividend of Rs 4.50 per e… [+1711 chars]
